entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
